name: PHP-CSL
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: PHP-CSL: Code Snippet Library. PHP-CSL is an online application written in PHP which enables authorised users to store and categorise code snippets.

matches.text: <meta name="description" content="PHP Code Snippet Library stores all your code for you for easy access, runs on any PHP platform and does not require a database... easy to install and full of features.">
<!-- Please note the credit message below is required if you want support -->

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<td align="right" class="hdr">Powered by: <a href="http:\/\/www\.php-csl\.com\/" class="foot" title="PHP-CSL">PHP-CSL V([^<]+)<\/a> <\/td>)
